original_text: Jesus replied, ‘If I said something wrong, tell us what it is. But if I said something that is true, you should not have hit me.’
korean_text: 예수께서 대답하시되 내가 말을 잘못하였으면 그 잘못한 것을 증언하라 바른 말을 하였으면 네가 어찌하여 나를 치느냐 하시더라

sentences.original_text: But if I said something that is true
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 만약 내가 진실된 말을 했다면

sentences.original_text: you should not have hit me
